Attribute.name: Objective
Attribute.Label: Objective
Attribute.Description: Objective for developing this process model. E.g. Objective is to automate order processing

Attribute.name: Goal
Attribute.Label: Goal
Attribute.Description: The goal of this process model. E.g. Goal is to reduce order processing cost by 10%

Attribute.name: OrganizationalUnit
Attribute.Label: Organizational Unit
Attribute.Description: The organizational unit that owns this process model

Attribute.name: Influencers
Attribute.Label: Influencers
Attribute.Description: People who have influenced development of this process model

Attribute.name: Risks
Attribute.Label: Risks
Attribute.Description: Risks associated with this process model

Attribute.name: Rewards
Attribute.Label: Rewards
Attribute.Description: Potential rewards on investment for this process model

Attribute.name: Executable
Attribute.Label: Executable
Attribute.Description: Can the Process Ever be made executable?
